view →

Built ChatterBox, a full-stack chat application using ReactJS, Node.js, and Express.js with server polling for near real-time messaging. Implemented Zod-based schema validation to ensure secure, reliable client–server communication

Resumai

March 2024 - April 2024
view →

Developed Resumai, a full-stack resume builder combining resume creation with AI assistance (Resume + AI). Built with React.js for a responsive UI and Express.js with PostgreSQL for secure data storage. Integrated Zod for robust schema validation and implemented an AI-powered suggestion system to help users generate and refine resume content, enabling a faster and more polished resume-building experience.

React.jsZodNextjs

Work

Full stack Developer

Yoliday LLP

March 2025 — July 2025

I enhanced Yoliday's web platform by integrating and customizing Strapi CMS, enabling seamless content updates without developer involvement. I designed and implemented new features to improve user experience and navigation, resolved UI/UX issues to ensure responsiveness across devices, and optimized overall performance. Leveraging React.js, Next.js, TypeScript, Zustand for state management, and modern styling libraries, I collaborated closely with the development team to maintain high code quality and follow best practices, resulting in a faster, more user-friendly platform

Full Stack Developer

May 2024 — Present

Collaborated with a 15-member team to architect and develop the new IIIT Dharwad website, delivering a functional base version within a stringent 10-day timeline. Contributed to the development of a robust CMS using Sanity.io to enhance functionality and streamline content management. Applied diverse development approaches for efficient delivery and took ownership of critical tasks
